category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: ScheduleTaskAvailableAttributes
preference.preference_description: Specifies the Schedule Task object attributes displayed in the Available Columns list in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a Program View is opened. Valid Values: ScheduleTask.object_desc - Displays Description in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.start_date - Displays Start Date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.finish_date - Displays Finish Date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.duration - Displays Duration in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.work_estimate - Displays Work Estimate in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.priority - Displays Priority in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.task_type - Displays Task Type in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.constraint - Displays Constraint in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.actual_start_date - Displays Actual Start Date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.actual_finish_date - Displays Actual Finish Date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.work_complete - Displays Work Complete in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.complete_percent - Displays Work Complete Percent in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.fnd0state - Displays State in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.fnd0status - Displays Status in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.SI - Displays Status Indicator in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.schedule_tag - Displays Schedule in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.ResourceAssignment - Displays ResourceAssignment in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened.
